name: Gangadhar Vasa
title: Senior Android Developer
summary: Senior Android Developer with 4+ years of experience building scalable, high-performance mobile applications.

sections.content: Senior Android Developer with 4+ years of experience building scalable, high-performance mobile applications. Specialized in Kotlin, Jetpack Compose, and Kotlin Multiplatform (KMP). Strong focus on clean architecture, modularization, and performance optimization.

sections.title: Technical Skills
items: Mobile: Android SDK, Jetpack Compose, XML
KMP: Shared business logic, Compose Multiplatform
Other: BLE Integration, REST APIs, Performance Optimization
